Barrier

shield (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 165
armor id [armor]: 68 (Barrier)
protection, shield [protshield]: 40
defence [def]: -2
parry [parry]: 11
encumbrance [enc]: 2
strength [str]: +4
resist fire [fireres]: +15
resist shock [shockres]: +15
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by mounted units

Requires 25E to forge (E4)

This great shield is inscribed with runes of fortitude and swiftness. It is said to be indestructible until its creator has died. The shield grants its bearer strength from the Earth itself, as well as protection from fire and lightning. Tower shields cannot be used by mounted troops.
